Hiorhusuparirq

門機醫潛啲眾嶄檸浪治浪嗎嶼太角來剪關量時弓

Its always like this, when you needed a guide, a coach, a compass in your life, there won’t be one.

Just won’t be one, either it’s broke or there’s just none.

You’ll have to count on yourself in the end, no matter what circumstance.

‘Cause you’re not fortunate enough to meet someone smarter and kinder than you.

The confusing, lost mind will soon not matter, ‘cause you’ll always find a way out.

I’m not tryna say you are alone, but in life such a long process, you can never find one just fit and can last long.

So you’ll have to learn how to be alone, yet gracious, gorgeous and glow like a firefly.
